Name: Little Italy
Ingredients: 52.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: This rye whiskey-based, Manhattan-like, bittersweet cocktail is a great digestivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2005 by Audrey Saunders for the opening menu of the Pegu Club in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Little Italy contains 176 calories
